articles.title: GME, Doge, Supreme: How Getting Rich Went Full Internet
articles.author: Felix Salmon
articles.author description: Felix Salmon, the chief financial correspondent at Axios, is an award-winning writer, editor, and podcaster. The host of the weekly Slate Money podcast, he was previously the finance blogger at Roubini Global Economics, Condé Nast Portfolio, and Reuters.

articles.author description: Paul Roberts is a journalist in Seattle who writes about technology, business and politics.
